reviews.text: The hotel is situated in a business office complex to the South-West of Milan, right on the outer ring-road of Milan in the suburb called Assago. You’d need a car or to take a taxi to drive the 10km into the city centre, so don't stay here if you want to see the centre of Milan.
reviews.title: Super-Convenient only for the Business Traveller

reviews.text: When I was there in Mid-October 2011, it was rather busy and at breakfast time, down-right overcrowded with other business users and Japanese Tourists (why?).
reviews.title: BAD BAD Location!!!!

reviews.text: The room was spacious and comfortable with a good work-desk. I paid the extra €10/day to get internet access and the run of the Mini-Bar.
reviews.title: Tired hotel with awful decor

reviews.text: Breakfast was included in my rate and this was quite a free-for-all event.
reviews.title: Convenient location

reviews.text: Always busy, with businessmen and women waking at the same time, eating at the same time and leaving for work at the same time.
reviews.title: Dated but not bad location for milanofiori - NO other upsides.

reviews.text: Stayed in the Jolly Milanofiori on business for a couple of nights. The hotel is situated in a business park, is large and reasonably comfortable, although the fixtures and fittings are starting to show their age. Beware of large groups of Japanese tourists - check with the desk to see if they have a tour party and ask for a quiet room as the sound proofing in the hotel is poor. Good breakfast buffet.
reviews.title: Uninspiring large chain hotel
Typical Euro Hotel - nothing special
reviews.text: Located a few kms south of the centre of Milan. Milanofiori is a large commercial office and retail park, and hotel is in the middle of this development.
Traffic in the surrounding streets and motorway can be very unpredictable at peak times - watch out if plannign a journey around that time..
reviews.title: Good for biz, concerts

reviews.text: Rooms are clean, sizeable and stylish.
reviews.title: Stealing Money!

reviews.text: Breakfast has a good choice. Restaurant in the evening is often quiet and a fairly uninspiring choice on the menu.
reviews.title: Stay Away

reviews.text: So we were on a visit for a furniture design exhibition. I should say., as far as I know the hotel location is way too far from where the exhibition was. Am pretty sure the exhibition was in a very good location in milan. so I guess the hotel loaction is just far away from everything. We got lost once reaching the hotel. The only ideal thing is that it was close to a mall. I ran to there to pick up some gifts 5 hourse before my flight. so that was a good experiance to have before leaving.
reviews.title: Not so nice

reviews.text: the rooms are so standard. a little bit old actually. but we had chocolate waiting for us. that was thoughtful.
reviews.title: Decent Business Hotel

reviews.text: Food is not at all good.
reviews.title: monumento al `900
Fantastic hotel
reviews.text: Pro's - Clean, Nice Restuarant - menu changes weekly, is good quality and the staff are excellant. Really good fitness centre for a hotel of this size/rating. There is also a large Carrefour and assorted shops across the street, including a cinema and the associated chain restaurants that you would normally find around it.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Con's - rooms are a bit dated and the checkin/checkout process is a bit laborious. Almost all rooms appear to be twin rooms. Not much sound insulation between rooms.
reviews.title: not 4 star standard.

reviews.text: Stayed one night at this NH Hotel in Milan, Italy. Better said, a bit outside of Milan. You'll need a Taxi to get to downtown (~20€).
reviews.title: Very nice for Italy - 102€ incl. Breakfast

reviews.text: The was clean, the shower a bit outdated and a nice flat screen TV. Breakfast was plenty like in most NH Hotels. I paid 102€ with Breakfast included. Stayed on the 5th Floor.
reviews.title: very clean and quiet

reviews.text: There is a huge Mall and Carefour across from the Hotel, I can really recommened going there. Burger King, Pizza and great stores. Open till 10pm.
reviews.title: Average Hotel

reviews.text: Thanks for a nice stay NH!
reviews.title: Average Milan standard, poor

reviews.text: it is a pity that so high standard hotel doesn't have appropriate internet and parking service
reviews.title: You may want to keep the lights dimmed
